title: U2 typographic designs
content:
Hi,  
Does anyone know which designer or agency created these, please? (It's U2's new single and DVD artwork.)  
Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [B000L22WS0.01.\_SS400\_SCLZZZZZZZ\_V50021260\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205019/http:/typophile.com/files/B000L22WS0.01._SS400_SCLZZZZZZZ_V50021260_.jpg) | 28.5 KB |
| [B000L22WSK.01.\_SS400\_SCLZZZZZZZ\_V49560380\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205019/http:/typophile.com/files/B000L22WSK.01._SS400_SCLZZZZZZZ_V49560380_.jpg) | 18.1 KB |
| [B000L22WSA.01.\_SS400\_SCLZZZZZZZ\_V48786448\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205019/http:/typophile.com/files/B000L22WSA.01._SS400_SCLZZZZZZZ_V48786448_.jpg) | 19.1 KB |
author: T Bones

comments.content: I expect that Shaughn McGrath / Steve Averill at Four5One° (here in Ireland) are the agency responsible. They take care of all of U2's design work. Sound lads as well.
